title: The Embrace
description: Ballet takes everything from you.All your sweat, all your tears, all your dedication, all your time.There are no drunken nights, no drugs, no boyfriends, no distractions whatsoever.But everyone has a dirty little secret...Working as a stripper at Club Ecstasy at night is Kaia's dark indiscretion. Sexy, mysterious billionaire Calum shows up as a patron at the club. He's drawn to her provocative innocence, not realizing that she is also a ballerina in his dance company. When she dances for him, he feels something stir in his cold, dead heart.After Calum finds out her little deception, he should turn her in. After all, ballet requires sacrifice. But to her surprise, he makes her an offer she can't refuse.And now she's staring into his dark blue eyes as she dances for him privately. Trying desperately to remember rule number one of being an exotic dancer.Don't fall for your customers.
author: Vivian Wood
